subject: Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Redskins safety Sean Taylor was fined four game paychecks by the National Football League for violating the league’s personal conduct policy. In June, Taylor reached an agreement with prosecutors to drop felony charges against him and pleaded no contest to two misdemeanors in an assault case, avoiding any jail time that might have derailed his career.
